Package index

Average Equivalence Testing

Functions for testing equivalence of means in univariate and multivariate settings using finite sample corrections (alpha-TOST, delta-TOST, optimal cTOST).

ctost()
Finite Sample Adjustment for Average (Bio)Equivalence Assessment
compare_to_tost()
Comparison of a Corrective Procedure to the results of the Two One-Sided Tests (TOST) in Univariate Settings

Quantile Equivalence Testing

Functions for testing equivalence at specific quantiles or across multiple quantiles.

qtost()
Quantile equivalence testing procedures
compare_to_qtost()
Comparison of a Corrective Procedure to the Results of the Quantile Two One-Sided Tests (qTOST) in Single Quantile Setting

Differential Privacy Equivalence Testing

Functions for equivalence testing under differential privacy constraints.

prop_test_equiv_dp()
Differentially Private TOST for Proportion Equivalence Testing
tost_equiv_dp()
Differentially Private TOST for Mean Equivalence Testing

Visualization and Output

Print and plot methods for displaying test results.

plot(<tost>)
Plot confidence intervals for one or more `tost` or `mtost` objects
print(<tost>)
Print Results of (Bio)Equivalence Assessment in Univariate Settings
print(<mtost>)
Print Results of (Bio)Equivalence Assessment in Multivariate Settings
print(<qtost>)
Print Results of (Bio)Equivalence testing in Single Quantile Setting.
print(<m_qtost>)
Print Results of (Bio)Equivalence testing in Two Quantiles Setting.
print(<prop_test_dp>)
Print Results of DP-TOST for Proportions
print(<tost_dp>)
Print method for DP-TOST mean test

Datasets

Real datasets for bioequivalence studies and examples.

skin
Log transformed cutaneous delivery of econazole (ECZ) from bioequivalent products on porcine skin
ticlopidine
Ticlopidine Bioequivalence Data
skin_mvt
Multivariate Skin Bioequivalence Data
biodistribution
Biodistribution Data

Internal/C++ Functions

Low-level C++ implementations for differential privacy computations.

tost_dp_one_sample_ultra_fast()
Ultra-fast C++ DP-TOST using Nelder-Mead (100x target)
